short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basic utility that helps with the formatting of song lyrics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A user can paste in song lyrics that have incorrect formatting (individual verses lack title-casing, extra newlines between verses, etc.) and, upon clicking on the Submit button, a re-formatted, fixed version of the lyrics is displayed. The lyrics are not stored anywhere.
